alert.note: Alert for Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 8:16PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Beltrami and southwestern Lake of the Woods Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 816 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fourtown, or 41 miles east of Thief River Falls, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ponemah, Upper Red Lake, Thorhult, Carmel, Malcolm, Fourtown and Jelle. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami
